nodes.text: The Doshan blood worm was a Red-colored species of worm that was considered by the Trandoshans to be a delicacy.

During the Clone Wars, the Padawan of the Jedi Master Bant Eerin met with the Trandoshan War Chief Raikhssa on the planet Trandosha to negotiate permission for the Galactic Republic to attack a Separatist base on the Trandoshan-controlled moon Akoshissss. During their meeting, Raikhssa offered the Padawan a bowl of Doshan blood worms to eat.
